sourcesContent:
<template>
<el-button type="primary" @click="add(props)">添加</el-button>
  <el-table :data="tbData" style="width: 100%">
    <el-table-column type="expand" style="left: 20px">
      <template #default="props">
        <!-- <template > -->
        <el-table
          :data="props.row.children"
          style="width: 100%; margin-left: 40px"
        >
          <el-table-column prop="departmentName" label="科室" width="150" />
          <el-table-column prop="level" label="级别" width="150" />
          <el-table-column prop="parentId" label="上级科室" width="150" />
          <el-table-column prop="createTime" label="日期" width="300" />
        </el-table>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="departmentName" />
  </el-table>
</template>

<style lang='scss' scoped>
.demo-table-expand {
  font-size: 0;
}
.demo-table-expand label {
  width: 90px;
  color: #99a9bf;
}
.demo-table-expand .el-form-item {
  margin-right: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  width: 50%;
}
.el-table
  .el-table--fit
  .el-table--enable-row-hover
  .el-table--enable-row-transition {
  margin-left: 47px !important;
}
</style>

<script>
import { get } from '@/utils/request'
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      tbData: []
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    get('/getAllDepartments').then((res) => {
      console.log(res)
      this.tbData = res.data
    })
  },
  methods: {}
}
</script>
